ðŸ“– Summary: FileBrowser Quantum is a web-based file manager written in Go, designed for easy access and management of files through a web interface. It is a fork of the original filebrowser project, offering enhanced features like multiple source support, advanced authentication options, a customizable UI, and improved indexing and sharing capabilities.
